name: snap
description: Puppeteer based microservice to take snapshots (images/PDF) of Redash visualizations and dashboards.

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run lint && npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cp -r fonts dist/.fonts && cd dist && npm install --production
scripts.start: cp -r ./node_modules dist && npm run babel && node ./dist/server.js
